price: 2. Yallay Qaranwaa kee baaxol tanim inkih leeh yamlike qibaada dibuk cakkisittam, booleey korosuh Qhiyaamah ayro, gibdi digaalay ken xagtu waytak.
arabic: ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّذِي لَهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ وَوَيۡلٞ لِّلۡكَٰفِرِينَ مِنۡ عَذَابٖ شَدِيدٍ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: al-lahi alladhī lahu mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wawaylun lil'kāfirīna min ʿadhābin shadīdin
